short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate Mailcow aliases on the fly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you ever want to sign up for something but feel uncomfortable giving away your email? Do you self host mailcow? Well then this is for you! This extension allows you to generate email address aliases using the mailcow API. You can enable/disable and delete aliases too.

Usage:
Right click on any page and click the "Generate Alias" option. This will automatically copy the email alias to your clipboard.
